data.what_is: Nurture is a marketing automation & revenue performance management application for B2B marketers.
data.product_description: Nurture is a marketing automation & revenue performance management application for B2B marketers.

initial_reviews.review_title: My Review for Nurture Marketing Automation Software
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nurture?
Nurture, Marketing Automation Software is used by many companies to handle their leads because it is simple to use and pretty affordable in comparison to similar marketing platforms like Hubspot

What do you dislike about Nurture?
The first thing you notice when you explore Nurture's website, is the large amount of features that they have to offer. This can be both a positive and negative. It's nice for companies who want to get started with something like marketing automation, but it also makes you wonder whether or not they are missing any crucial parts.

What problems is Nurture solving and how is that benefiting you?
My favorite  part of Nurture's site is the feature list. It really shows everything that this software can do and it gives you a sense as to whether or not this could be a good fit for your company.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Nurture?
it's easy to use; you can check your leads and see opportunities

What do you dislike about Nurture?
it is hard to integrate with other apps or software

What problems is Nurture solving and how is that benefiting you?
Manage all my leads, generate more sales and track their situation

I would like most they have all major kind of automation process which help us to get best from out product and databases etc.

What do you dislike about Nurture?
They have very good products but sometimes they leg and slow response
